ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] New bard wep (spoiler maybe)
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, saw that last night too ;o)  Seeing as how there were some other entries from Old Sebilis and Howling Stones, I would guess that it s probably from there
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, saw that last night too ;o) Seeing as how there were some other
entries from Old Sebilis and Howling Stones, I would guess that it's
probably from there (smart plat is on Howling Stones ;o)~ )

-=B=-
36th and seeing exp movement again!
Whoooooo-hooo!!
The Rathe

From: Sylly Songsynger <jgs@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>

Subject: [eqbards] New bard wep (spoiler maybe)

is

> Sylly
